rawConfiguration.text:
This dashboard provides a **high-level** overview of your TiDB clusters.

Further reading on TiDB monitoring: [Metrics available to New Relic](https://docs.pingcap.com/tidbcloud/monitor-new-relic-integration#metrics-available-to-newrelic)

Clone this template dashboard to make changes and add your own graph widgets.

nrqlQueries.query: SELECT (average(`tidb_cloud.db_database_time`) * cardinality(`tidb_cloud.db_database_time`)) AS 'Total' FROM Metric SINCE 24 HOURS AGO TIMESERIES WHERE project_name IN ({{project_name}}) AND cluster_id IN ({{cluster_id}}) AND cluster_name IN ({{cluster_name}}) AND instance IN ({{instance}})

SELECT (average(`tidb_cloud.db_database_time`) * cardinality(`tidb_cloud.db_database_time`)) FROM Metric FACET sql_type SINCE 24 HOURS AGO TIMESERIES WHERE project_name IN ({{project_name}}) AND cluster_id IN ({{cluster_id}}) AND cluster_name IN ({{cluster_name}}) AND instance IN ({{instance}})

SELECT (average(`tidb_cloud.db_query_per_second`) * cardinality(`tidb_cloud.db_query_per_second`)) AS 'Total' FROM Metric SINCE 24 HOURS AGO TIMESERIES WHERE project_name IN ({{project_name}}) AND cluster_id IN ({{cluster_id}}) AND cluster_name IN ({{cluster_name}}) AND instance IN ({{instance}})

SELECT (average(`tidb_cloud.db_query_per_second`) * cardinality(`tidb_cloud.db_query_per_second`)) FROM Metric FACET type SINCE 24 HOURS AGO TIMESERIES WHERE project_name IN ({{project_name}}) AND cluster_id IN ({{cluster_id}}) AND cluster_name IN ({{cluster_name}}) AND instance IN ({{instance}})

SELECT average(`tidb_cloud.db_average_query_duration`) FROM Metric FACET sql_type SINCE 24 HOURS AGO TIMESERIES WHERE project_name IN ({{project_name}}) AND cluster_id IN ({{cluster_id}}) AND cluster_name IN ({{cluster_name}}) AND instance IN ({{instance}})

SELECT (average(`tidb_cloud.db_failed_queries`) * cardinality(`tidb_cloud.db_failed_queries`)) AS 'Failed Query' FROM Metric SINCE 24 HOURS AGO TIMESERIES WHERE project_name IN ({{project_name}}) AND cluster_id IN ({{cluster_id}}) AND cluster_name IN ({{cluster_name}}) AND instance IN ({{instance}})

SELECT (average(`tidb_cloud.db_total_connection`) * cardinality(`tidb_cloud.db_total_connection`)) AS 'Total Conncetion' FROM Metric SINCE 24 HOURS AGO TIMESERIES WHERE project_name IN ({{project_name}}) AND cluster_id IN ({{cluster_id}}) AND cluster_name IN ({{cluster_name}}) AND instance IN ({{instance}}) AND component = 'tidb'

SELECT (average(`tidb_cloud.db_active_connections`) * cardinality(`tidb_cloud.db_active_connections`)) AS 'Active Connection' FROM Metric SINCE 24 HOURS AGO TIMESERIES WHERE project_name IN ({{project_name}}) AND cluster_id IN ({{cluster_id}}) AND cluster_name IN ({{cluster_name}}) AND instance IN ({{instance}})

SELECT (average(`tidb_cloud.db_disconnections`) * cardinality(`tidb_cloud.db_disconnections`)) FROM Metric FACET tuple(result, instance) SINCE 24 HOURS AGO TIMESERIES WHERE project_name IN ({{project_name}}) AND cluster_id IN ({{cluster_id}}) AND cluster_name IN ({{cluster_name}}) AND instance IN ({{instance}})

SELECT (average(`tidb_cloud.db_command_per_second`) * cardinality(`tidb_cloud.db_command_per_second`)) AS 'Total' FROM Metric SINCE 24 HOURS AGO TIMESERIES WHERE project_name IN ({{project_name}}) AND cluster_id IN ({{cluster_id}}) AND cluster_name IN ({{cluster_name}}) AND instance IN ({{instance}})
SELECT (average(`tidb_cloud.db_command_per_second`) * cardinality(`tidb_cloud.db_command_per_second`)) FROM Metric FACET type SINCE 24 HOURS AGO TIMESERIES

SELECT (average(`tidb_cloud.db_queries_using_plan_cache_ops`) * cardinality(`tidb_cloud.db_queries_using_plan_cache_ops`)) AS 'Total' FROM Metric SINCE 24 HOURS AGO TIMESERIES WHERE project_name IN ({{project_name}}) AND cluster_id IN ({{cluster_id}}) AND cluster_name IN ({{cluster_name}}) AND instance IN ({{instance}})

SELECT (average(`tidb_cloud.db_transaction_per_second`) * cardinality(`tidb_cloud.db_transaction_per_second`)) AS 'Total' FROM Metric SINCE 24 HOURS AGO TIMESERIES WHERE project_name IN ({{project_name}}) AND cluster_id IN ({{cluster_id}}) AND cluster_name IN ({{cluster_name}}) AND instance IN ({{instance}})
SELECT (average(`tidb_cloud.db_transaction_per_second`) * cardinality(`tidb_cloud.db_transaction_per_second`)) FROM Metric FACET tuple(type, txn_mode) SINCE 24 HOURS AGO TIMESERIES

SELECT (average(`tidb_cloud.node_cpu_capacity_cores`) * cardinality(`tidb_cloud.node_cpu_capacity_cores`)) FROM Metric FACET instance WHERE (component = 'tidb') SINCE 24 HOURS AGO TIMESERIES WHERE project_name IN ({{project_name}}) AND cluster_id IN ({{cluster_id}}) AND cluster_name IN ({{cluster_name}}) AND instance IN ({{instance}})

SELECT (average(`tidb_cloud.node_cpu_seconds_total_rate`) * cardinality(`tidb_cloud.node_cpu_seconds_total_rate`)) FROM Metric WHERE (component = 'tidb') SINCE 60 MINUTES AGO UNTIL NOW FACET instance LIMIT 100 TIMESERIES 120000 SLIDE BY 60000 WHERE project_name IN ({{project_name}}) AND cluster_id IN ({{cluster_id}}) AND cluster_name IN ({{cluster_name}}) AND instance IN ({{instance}})

SELECT (average(`tidb_cloud.node_memory_capacity_bytes`) * cardinality(`tidb_cloud.node_memory_capacity_bytes`)) FROM Metric FACET instance WHERE component = 'tidb' SINCE 24 HOURS AGO TIMESERIES WHERE project_name IN ({{project_name}}) AND cluster_id IN ({{cluster_id}}) AND cluster_name IN ({{cluster_name}}) AND instance IN ({{instance}})

SELECT (average(`tidb_cloud.node_memory_used_bytes`) * cardinality(`tidb_cloud.node_memory_used_bytes`)) FROM Metric FACET instance WHERE component = 'tidb' SINCE 24 HOURS AGO TIMESERIES WHERE project_name IN ({{project_name}}) AND cluster_id IN ({{cluster_id}}) AND cluster_name IN ({{cluster_name}}) AND instance IN ({{instance}})

SELECT (average(`tidb_cloud.node_cpu_capacity_cores`) * cardinality(`tidb_cloud.node_cpu_capacity_cores`)) FROM Metric FACET instance WHERE (component = 'tikv') SINCE 24 HOURS AGO TIMESERIES WHERE project_name IN ({{project_name}}) AND cluster_id IN ({{cluster_id}}) AND cluster_name IN ({{cluster_name}}) AND instance IN ({{instance}})

SELECT (average(`tidb_cloud.node_cpu_seconds_total_rate`) * cardinality(`tidb_cloud.node_cpu_seconds_total_rate`)) FROM Metric WHERE (component = 'tikv') SINCE 60 MINUTES AGO UNTIL NOW FACET instance LIMIT 100 TIMESERIES 120000 SLIDE BY 60000 WHERE project_name IN ({{project_name}}) AND cluster_id IN ({{cluster_id}}) AND cluster_name IN ({{cluster_name}}) AND instance IN ({{instance}})

SELECT (average(`tidb_cloud.node_memory_capacity_bytes`) * cardinality(`tidb_cloud.node_memory_capacity_bytes`)) FROM Metric FACET instance WHERE component = 'tikv' SINCE 24 HOURS AGO TIMESERIES WHERE project_name IN ({{project_name}}) AND cluster_id IN ({{cluster_id}}) AND cluster_name IN ({{cluster_name}}) AND instance IN ({{instance}})

SELECT (average(`tidb_cloud.node_memory_used_bytes`) * cardinality(`tidb_cloud.node_memory_used_bytes`)) FROM Metric FACET instance WHERE component = 'tikv' SINCE 24 HOURS AGO TIMESERIES WHERE project_name IN ({{project_name}}) AND cluster_id IN ({{cluster_id}}) AND cluster_name IN ({{cluster_name}}) AND instance IN ({{instance}})

SELECT (average(`tidb_cloud.node_storage_capacity_bytes`) * cardinality(`tidb_cloud.node_storage_capacity_bytes`)) FROM Metric FACET instance WHERE component = 'tikv' SINCE 24 HOURS AGO TIMESERIES WHERE project_name IN ({{project_name}}) AND cluster_id IN ({{cluster_id}}) AND cluster_name IN ({{cluster_name}}) AND instance IN ({{instance}})

SELECT (average(`tidb_cloud.node_storage_used_bytes`) * cardinality(`tidb_cloud.node_storage_used_bytes`)) FROM Metric FACET instance WHERE component = 'tikv' SINCE 24 HOURS AGO TIMESERIES WHERE project_name IN ({{project_name}}) AND cluster_id IN ({{cluster_id}}) AND cluster_name IN ({{cluster_name}}) AND instance IN ({{instance}})

SELECT (average(`tidb_cloud.node_cpu_capacity_cores`) * cardinality(`tidb_cloud.node_cpu_capacity_cores`)) FROM Metric FACET instance WHERE (component = 'tiflash') SINCE 24 HOURS AGO TIMESERIES WHERE project_name IN ({{project_name}}) AND cluster_id IN ({{cluster_id}}) AND cluster_name IN ({{cluster_name}}) AND instance IN ({{instance}})

SELECT (average(`tidb_cloud.node_cpu_seconds_total_rate`) * cardinality(`tidb_cloud.node_cpu_seconds_total_rate`)) FROM Metric WHERE (component = 'tiflash') SINCE 60 MINUTES AGO UNTIL NOW FACET instance LIMIT 100 TIMESERIES 120000 SLIDE BY 60000 WHERE project_name IN ({{project_name}}) AND cluster_id IN ({{cluster_id}}) AND cluster_name IN ({{cluster_name}}) AND instance IN ({{instance}})

SELECT (average(`tidb_cloud.node_memory_capacity_bytes`) * cardinality(`tidb_cloud.node_memory_capacity_bytes`)) FROM Metric FACET instance WHERE component = 'tiflash' SINCE 24 HOURS AGO TIMESERIES WHERE project_name IN ({{project_name}}) AND cluster_id IN ({{cluster_id}}) AND cluster_name IN ({{cluster_name}}) AND instance IN ({{instance}})

SELECT (average(`tidb_cloud.node_memory_used_bytes`) * cardinality(`tidb_cloud.node_memory_used_bytes`)) FROM Metric FACET instance WHERE component = 'tiflash' SINCE 24 HOURS AGO TIMESERIES WHERE project_name IN ({{project_name}}) AND cluster_id IN ({{cluster_id}}) AND cluster_name IN ({{cluster_name}}) AND instance IN ({{instance}})

SELECT (average(`tidb_cloud.node_storage_capacity_bytes`) * cardinality(`tidb_cloud.node_storage_capacity_bytes`)) FROM Metric FACET instance WHERE component = 'tiflash' SINCE 24 HOURS AGO TIMESERIES WHERE project_name IN ({{project_name}}) AND cluster_id IN ({{cluster_id}}) AND cluster_name IN ({{cluster_name}}) AND instance IN ({{instance}})

SELECT (average(`tidb_cloud.node_storage_used_bytes`) * cardinality(`tidb_cloud.node_storage_used_bytes`)) FROM Metric FACET instance WHERE component = 'tiflash' SINCE 24 HOURS AGO TIMESERIES WHERE project_name IN ({{project_name}}) AND cluster_id IN ({{cluster_id}}) AND cluster_name IN ({{cluster_name}}) AND instance IN ({{instance}})

SELECT (average(`tidb_cloud.db_component_uptime`) * cardinality(`tidb_cloud.db_component_uptime`)) FROM Metric FACET instance SINCE 24 HOURS AGO TIMESERIES WHERE cluster_id IN ({{cluster_id}}) AND cluster_name IN ({{cluster_name}}) AND instance IN ({{instance}})

SELECT (average(`tidb_cloud.db_kv_request_duration`) * cardinality(`tidb_cloud.db_kv_request_duration`)) FROM Metric FACET tuple(type) SINCE 24 HOURS AGO TIMESERIES WHERE project_name IN ({{project_name}}) AND cluster_id IN ({{cluster_id}}) AND cluster_name IN ({{cluster_name}}) AND instance IN ({{instance}})

SELECT (average(`tidb_cloud.node_disk_read_latency`) * cardinality(`tidb_cloud.node_disk_read_latency`)) FROM Metric FACET tuple(instance, device) SINCE 24 HOURS AGO TIMESERIES WHERE project_name IN ({{project_name}}) AND cluster_id IN ({{cluster_id}}) AND cluster_name IN ({{cluster_name}}) AND instance IN ({{instance}})

SELECT (average(`tidb_cloud.node_disk_write_latency`) * cardinality(`tidb_cloud.node_disk_write_latency`)) FROM Metric FACET tuple(instance, device) SINCE 24 HOURS AGO TIMESERIES WHERE project_name IN ({{project_name}}) AND cluster_id IN ({{cluster_id}}) AND cluster_name IN ({{cluster_name}}) AND instance IN ({{instance}})

SELECT (average(`tidb_cloud.resource_manager_resource_unit_read_request_unit`) * cardinality(`tidb_cloud.resource_manager_resource_unit_read_request_unit`))AS 'RU read' FROM Metric SINCE 24 HOURS AGO TIMESERIES WHERE project_name IN ({{project_name}}) AND cluster_id IN ({{cluster_id}}) AND cluster_name IN ({{cluster_name}})

SELECT (average(`tidb_cloud.resource_manager_resource_unit_write_request_unit`) * cardinality(`tidb_cloud.resource_manager_resource_unit_write_request_unit`))AS 'RU write' FROM Metric SINCE 24 HOURS AGO TIMESERIES WHERE project_name IN ({{project_name}}) AND cluster_id IN ({{cluster_id}}) AND cluster_name IN ({{cluster_name}})

SELECT (average(`tidb_cloud.dm_task_state`) * cardinality(`tidb_cloud.dm_task_state`)) FROM Metric FACET tuple(instance)  SINCE 24 HOURS AGO TIMESERIES WHERE project_name IN ({{project_name}}) AND cluster_id IN ({{cluster_id}}) AND cluster_name IN ({{cluster_name}})

SELECT 
  percentile(`tidb_cloud.dm_syncer_replication_lag_bucket`, 90) 
FROM Metric 
FACET tuple(task)
SINCE 24 HOURS AGO 
TIMESERIES 
WHERE project_name IN ({{project_name}}) 
  AND cluster_id IN ({{cluster_id}}) 
  AND cluster_name IN ({{cluster_name}})

SELECT (average(`tidb_cloud.dm_dm_syncer_replication_lag_gauge`) * cardinality(`tidb_cloud.dm_dm_syncer_replication_lag_gauge`)) FROM Metric FACET tuple(instance, task) SINCE 24 HOURS AGO TIMESERIES WHERE project_name IN ({{project_name}}) AND cluster_id IN ({{cluster_id}}) AND cluster_name IN ({{cluster_name}})

widgets.title: DM Fail to Read Binlog from Master

nrqlQueries.query: SELECT (average(`tidb_cloud.dm_relay_read_error_count`) * cardinality(`tidb_cloud.dm_relay_read_error_count`)) FROM Metric FACET instance SINCE 24 HOURS AGO TIMESERIES WHERE project_name IN ({{project_name}}) AND cluster_id IN ({{cluster_id}}) AND cluster_name IN ({{cluster_name}})

SELECT (average(`tidb_cloud.cdc_changefeed_resolved_ts_lag`) * cardinality(`tidb_cloud.cdc_changefeed_resolved_ts_lag`)) FROM Metric FACET changefeed_id SINCE 24 HOURS AGO TIMESERIES WHERE project_name IN ({{project_name}}) AND cluster_id IN ({{cluster_id}}) AND cluster_name IN ({{cluster_name}})

SELECT (average(`tidb_cloud.cdc_changefeed_latency`) * cardinality(`tidb_cloud.cdc_changefeed_latency`)) FROM Metric FACET changefeed_id SINCE 24 HOURS AGO TIMESERIES WHERE project_name IN ({{project_name}}) AND cluster_id IN ({{cluster_id}}) AND cluster_name IN ({{cluster_name}})

SELECT (average(`tidb_cloud.cdc_checkpoint_ts`) * cardinality(`tidb_cloud.cdc_checkpoint_ts`)) FROM Metric FACET changefeed_id SINCE 24 HOURS AGO TIMESERIES WHERE project_name IN ({{project_name}}) AND cluster_id IN ({{cluster_id}}) AND cluster_name IN ({{cluster_name}})

SELECT (average(`tidb_cloud.cdc_changefeed_status`) * cardinality(`tidb_cloud.cdc_changefeed_status`)) FROM Metric FACET tuple(changefeed_id) SINCE 24 HOURS AGO TIMESERIES WHERE project_name IN ({{project_name}}) AND cluster_id IN ({{cluster_id}}) AND cluster_name IN ({{cluster_name}})

SELECT (average(`tidb_cloud.cdc_changefeed_replica_rows`) * cardinality(`tidb_cloud.cdc_changefeed_replica_rows`)) FROM Metric FACET changefeed_id SINCE 24 HOURS AGO TIMESERIES WHERE project_name IN ({{project_name}}) AND cluster_id IN ({{cluster_id}}) AND cluster_name IN ({{cluster_name}})

nrqlQuery.query: SELECT uniques(project_name) FROM Metric WHERE metricName='tidb_cloud.db_database_time'
SELECT uniques(cluster_id) FROM Metric WHERE metricName='tidb_cloud.db_database_time'
SELECT uniques(cluster_name) FROM Metric WHERE metricName='tidb_cloud.db_database_time'
